description: International English Language Testing System (Academic & General)
curriculum_standard: Based on official IELTS Writing Band Descriptors (Task 1 & 2)

topic_coverage.summary: Focus on academic argumentation, data analysis, and general correspondence.

categories.name: Category 1: Task 2 - Social Issues
example_prompts: Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of online study.
Should government invest more in arts or science?
To what extent do you agree that AI is dangerous?

categories.name: Category 2: Task 1 - Data Reporting (Academic)
example_prompts: Describe the changes in the town of Westley.
Summarize the information in the graph about coffee production.

categories.name: Category 3: Task 1 - Letter Writing (General)
example_prompts: Write a letter to your manager complaining about the workload.
Write a letter to a friend inviting them to a party.

vocabulary.level_requirement: Band 7+ Range. Precise, less common lexical items, collocations.

complex_structures: Complex Comparisons (X is three times as high as Y)
Nominalization (Using nouns instead of verbs for formality)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Wide range of structures used flexibly and accurately.

writing_standards.structure: Task 1: Intro -> Overview -> Detail Paragraphs. Task 2: Intro -> Body 1 -> Body 2 -> Conclusion.
writing_standards.cohesion: Skillful management of paragraphing and cohesive devices.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Task Achievement/Response, Coherence & Cohesion, Lexical Resource, Grammatical Range & Accuracy.
